Description: Glazed composition shabti of Horiraa with a lappet-wig, a modelled face with a beard, crossed hands in relief holding two incised hoes and the string of the seed-basket which hangs over the shoulder, the legs are inscribed with part of Chapter 6 of The Book of The Dead in eight rows of incised Hieroglyphs unseparated by lines; there is a back-pillar and a plinth beneath the feet.
